channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Solr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Solr

item.title: CVE-2019-0192|2024-09-16T16:53:42.278Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20solr
item.description: In Apache Solr versions 5.0.0 to 5.5.5 and 6.0.0 to 6.6.5, the Config API allows to configure the JMX server via an HTTP POST request. By pointing it to a malicious RMI server, an attacker could take advantage of Solr's unsafe deserialization to trigger remote code execution on the Solr side.
